import axios from "axios"; import React, {useState} from "react"; import { FaLock } from "react-icons/fa"; function SavePassword() { const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const [secondPassword, setSecondPassword] = useState("") axios.post("http://localhost:5050/password-update", {password: password}) .then((response) => { console.log(response) window.location.href = "/login" }) return (
